name: Into The Shade
description:
MADE DURING A 72 HOUR 'MINIMALISM' GAME JAM


INTRO

Into The Shade is a 2D platform puzzle game.

You play as Square Head. He has the ability to change different shades of the colour red which when matched with a shade of colour in the environment allows you to go into the shade.

Use this to work your way through each level. (2 made for game jam, more to follow)

CONTROL

ACTIONPCXBOXMOVE (Left/Right)A / DThumbstick Left / D-Pad Left/Right
JUMPSpacebarACHANGE SHADE1/2/3X / Y / BHELPERCTRLLeft BumperPAUSEPFace Special Right Button

Partial Xbox controller support. (Works for gameplay but not in the menus...yet)

GAMEPLAY

Work through each level finding your way to the exit.

Each level has 3 collectables. These are shown as yellow circles on the level select screen. The player can also track how many they have found in the pause menu. (Top right)
